base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with two doors and drawers.
part_description: Two drawers on top, two doors below; handles centered. Rectangular shape, medium size, with flat top surface.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out along tracks, allowing access to storage space. The doors swing open on hinges, revealing a larger compartment. Handles facilitate easy opening and closing of both drawers and doors, ensuring smooth operation.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, providing storage in kitchens or bathrooms. It interacts with users through its handles, allowing access to stored items. Its flat top can hold small objects, enhancing functionality in various settings.
